nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING ISSUED FOR PORTIONS OF THE WESTERN GULF COAST... ...BERYL EXPECTED TO BE A HURRICANE NEAR LANDFALL IN TEXAS...
summary:
...TROPICAL STORM WARNING ISSUED FOR PORTIONS OF THE WESTERN GULF COAST... ...BERYL EXPECTED TO BE A HURRICANE NEAR LANDFALL IN TEXAS...
 As of 10:00 AM CDT Sat Jul 6
 the center of Beryl was located near 23.0, -92.3
 with movement WNW at 12 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 997 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.
